final_answer:
The humor in the image stems from a common packaging irony. The left side shows a pair of scissors, representing the solution to opening many packages. The right side illustrates scissors in packaging that typically requires scissors to open.

The text "YES, BUT" enhances the satire, highlighting the contradiction: "YES," you have scissors, "BUT" you need scissors to access them. This highlights the impracticality and absurdity of such packaging designs, creating a humorous critique of everyday frustrations.
